---
title: "About"
---

BST'623 "Software Tools for Manuscript Development and Reproducible Research" is a course at the University of Miami, offered by the Biostatistics program. This class is taught by professor, Dr. Raymond Balise. The course  focus on the use of software tools for creating professional-quality manuscripts and conducting reproducible research. Whether you're an experienced researcher or just starting out, BST 623 will provide valuable skills and knowledge to use R for your research.
